articles.description: A meeting of Wrexham County Borough Council’s planning committee earlier today granted approval of the Club’s application to construct a new 5,500 capacity stand at the Racecourse Ground.
articles.content:
A meeting of Wrexham County Borough Councils planning committee earlier today granted approval of the Clubs application to construct a new 5,500 capacity stand at the Racecourse Ground.

articles.content:
